verses.verse: And after<WG3326> these<WG5023> things I heard<WG191> a great<WG3173> voice<WG5456> of much<WG4183> people<WG3793> in heaven,<WG3321> saying,<WG3004> Alleluia;<WG239> Salvation,<WG4991> and glory,<WG1391> and honor,<WG5092> and power,<WG1411> to the Lord<WG2962> our God:<WG2316>

For true<WG228> and righteous<WG1342> are his judgments:<WG2920> for he has judged<WG2919> the great<WG3173> whore,<WG4204> which<WG3748> did corrupt<WG5351> the earth<WG1093> with her fornication,<WG4202> and has avenged<WG1556> the blood<WG129> of his servants<WG1401> at<WG1537> her hand.<WG5495>
And again<WG1208> they said,<WG2046> Alleluia <WG239>And her smoke<WG2586> rose<WG305> up for ever<WG165> and ever.<WG165>

And the four<WG5064> and twenty<WG1501> elders<WG4245> and the four<WG5064> beasts<WG2226> fell<WG4098> down and worshipped<WG4352> God<WG2316> that sat<WG2521> on<WG1909> the throne,<WG2362> saying,<WG3004> Amen;<WG281> Alleluia.<WG239>

And a voice<WG5456> came<WG1881> out of the throne,<WG2362> saying,<WG3004> Praise<WG134> our God,<WG2316> all<WG3956> you his servants,<WG1401> and you that fear<WG5399> him, both small<WG3398> and great.<WG3173>

And I heard<WG191> as it were the voice<WG5456> of a great<WG4183> multitude,<WG3793> and as the voice<WG5456> of many<WG4183> waters,<WG5204> and as the voice<WG5456> of mighty<WG2478> thunder,<WG1027> saying,<WG3004> Alleluia:<WG239> for the Lord<WG2962> God<WG2316> omnipotent<WG3841> reigns.<WG936>

Let us be glad<WG5463> and rejoice,<WG21> and give<WG1325> honor<WG1391> to him: for the marriage<WG1062> of the Lamb<WG721> is come,<WG2064> and his wife<WG1135> has made<WG2090> herself<WG1438> ready.<WG2090>
And to her was granted<WG1325> that she should be arrayed<WG4016> in fine linen,<WG1039> clean<WG2513> and white:<WG2986> for the fine linen<WG1039> is the righteousness<WG1345> of saints.<WG40>

And he said<WG3004> to me, Write,<WG1125> Blessed<WG3107> are they which are called<WG2564> to the marriage<WG1062> supper<WG1173> of the Lamb.<WG721> And he said<WG3004> to me, These<WG3778> are the true<WG228> sayings<WG3056> of God.<WG2316>

And I fell<WG4098> at<WG1715> his feet<WG4228> to worship<WG4352> him. And he said<WG3004> to me, See<WG3700> you do it not: I am<WG1510> your fellow servant,<WG4889> and of your brothers<WG80> that have<WG2192> the testimony<WG3141> of Jesus:<WG2424> worship<WG4352> God:<WG2316> for the testimony<WG3141> of Jesus<WG2424> is the spirit<WG4151> of prophecy.<WG4394>

And I saw<WG1492> heaven<WG3321> opened,<WG455> and behold<WG2400> a white<WG3022> horse;<WG2462> and he that sat<WG2521> on him was called<WG2564> Faithful<WG4103> and True,<WG228> and in righteousness<WG1343> he does judge<WG2919> and make<WG4170> war.<WG4170>

His eyes<WG3788> were as a flame<WG5395> of fire,<WG4442> and on<WG1909> his head<WG2776> were many<WG4183> crowns;<WG1238> and he had<WG2192> a name<WG3686> written,<WG1125> that no<WG3762> man<WG3762> knew,<WG1492> but he himself.
And he was clothed<WG4016> with a clothing<WG2440> dipped<WG911> in blood:<WG129> and his name<WG3686> is called<WG2564> The Word<WG3056> of God.<WG2316>
And the armies<WG4753> which<WG3588> were in heaven<WG3321> followed<WG190> him on white<WG3022> horses,<WG2462> clothed<WG1746> in fine linen,<WG1039> white<WG3022> and clean.<WG2513>

And out of his mouth<WG4750> goes<WG1607> a sharp<WG3691> sword,<WG4501> that with it he should smite<WG3960> the nations:<WG1484> and he shall rule<WG4165> them with a rod<WG4464> of iron:<WG4603> and he treads<WG3961> the wine press<WG3025> <WG3631> of the fierceness<WG2372> and wrath<WG3709> of Almighty<WG3841> God.<WG2316>
And he has<WG2192> on<WG1909> his clothing<WG2440> and on<WG1909> his thigh<WG3382> a name<WG3686> written,<WG1125> KING<WG935> OF KINGS,<WG935> AND LORD<WG2962> OF LORDS.<WG2962>

And I saw<WG1492> an angel<WG32> standing<WG2476> in the sun;<WG2246> and he cried<WG2896> with a loud<WG3173> voice,<WG5456> saying<WG3004> to all<WG3956> the fowls<WG3732> that fly<WG4072> in the middle<WG3321> of heaven,<WG3321> Come<WG1205> and gather<WG4863> yourselves together<WG4863> to the supper<WG1173> of the great<WG3173> God;<WG2316>

That you may eat<WG5315> the flesh<WG4561> of kings,<WG935> and the flesh<WG4561> of captains,<WG5506> and the flesh<WG4561> of mighty<WG2478> men, and the flesh<WG4561> of horses,<WG2462> and of them that sit<WG2521> on<WG1909> them, and the flesh<WG4561> of all<WG3956> men, both<WG5037> free<WG1658> and bond,<WG1401> both<WG2532> small<WG3398> and great.<WG3173>

And I saw<WG1492> the beast,<WG2342> and the kings<WG935> of the earth,<WG1093> and their armies,<WG4753> gathered<WG4863> together<WG4863> to make<WG4160> war<WG4171> against<WG3326> him that sat<WG2521> on<WG1909> the horse,<WG2462> and against<WG3326> his army.<WG4753>

And the beast<WG2342> was taken,<WG4084> and with him the false<WG5578> prophet<WG5578> that worked<WG4160> miracles<WG4592> before<WG1799> him, with which<WG3739> he deceived<WG4105> them that had received<WG2983> the mark<WG5480> of the beast,<WG2342> and them that worshipped<WG4352> his image.<WG1504> These<WG3588> both<WG1417> were cast<WG906> alive<WG2198> into<WG1519> a lake<WG3041> of fire<WG4442> burning<WG2545> with brimstone.<WG2303>

And the remnant<WG3062> were slain<WG615> with the sword<WG4501> of him that sat<WG2521> on the horse,<WG2462> which<WG3588> sword proceeded<WG1607> out of his mouth:<WG4750> and all<WG3956> the fowls<WG3732> were filled<WG5526> with their flesh.<WG4561>
